about_the_game:
View the amazing artwork of Maelstrom at your leisure and get insight into the game's history and development with this 64-page art book.

Once you purchase and download this DLC to your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (Maelstrom: A Yaoi Visual Novel) from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the art book in this folder.

Features

  • 64 pages
  • Gorgeous artwork: sprites, CGs, and BGs!
  • Character design drafts
  • Insight and commentary on Maelstrom

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content. Depictions of sex scenes.
